description:
Emancipate yourself from the cloud, protect your data and privacy.

Deploying a full blown customized ans private solution including videoconference on premise was a breeze.

But this app works pretty well as a replacement for Slack/Discord. Is it as good? No, not yet. Is it good? Yeah, I'd say so. There are many features already included, and it's very easy to enable WebRTC for calling other users and routing it through the server. Makes it easy for on premise deployments. Rock on Rocket Chat, your developers are really on to something.
summary: Not updated as quickly as the regular version..
